About

Welcome to the home page of Prasad Talasila. I am pursuing doctoral studies in the area of Network Science. The Research and Publications pages contain more relevant information on research, publications and data sets.

I also work as Lecturer n the Department of CS&IS, BITS, Pilani - KK Birla Goa Campus. The courses that I handle are available under Courses section. A snapshot of my professional life is available on Resume page. I also happen to enjoy half-marathons. More details on running experiences are available on Marathons page.

Some of my short articles, lecture notes and lab manuals are available for download. These materials are available in Writings section.

My impromptu ramblings, if any, are filed in the Blog. Please see the Contact page for various ways of getting in touch with me.
